body.name: Dr. Brown's Anti-Colic Baby Feeding Set with Slow Flow Nipples, Travel Caps, Silicone Pacifier - Pink

features: ANTI-COLIC BABY BOTTLE FEEDING SET. Anti-Colic internal vent system is clinically proven to reduce colic. Decreases spit-up, burping and gas.
CONSISTENT FLOW RATE. Vacuum-free feeding is closest to breastfeeding and Dr. Brown’s silicone nipples provide a consistent flow so babies can feed at their own pace.
PRESERVES NUTRIENTS. The anti-colic vent system is proven to help preserve bottle milk nutrients and aids in digestion for a better night’s sleep.
BREASTFEEDING BOTTLE. The breast-like nipple shape encourages a proper latch for a more natural bottle feeding experience and eases the transition from breast to bottle and back again.

BOTTLE GROWS WITH BABY. Dr. Brown’s Natural Flow Anti-Colic Options+ baby bottle works best with the internal vent system in place but can be removed as baby’s feeding develops – no need to introduce a different bottle.

FEED, STORE, SOOTHE. Find the perfect flow for introducing a bottle to your breastfed newborn using the two nipple levels included, Preemie Flow (Slowest Flow) and Level 1 (Slow Flow). Store, transport and warm bottles with ease using the included storage/travel caps. Introducing baby to a pacifier is easy with Dr. Brown’s HappyPaci 100% silicone one-piece pacifier, shaped like Dr. Brown’s bottle nipple that’s familiar to baby.
SUSTAINABLE BABY BOTTLE. Dr. Brown’s Narrow bottle is designed to nourish through all of baby’s feeding stages and is recyclable.
DISHWASHER SAFE. Safe for use in dishwasher (top rack only), electric and microwave sterilizers or boiling water. BPA Free.
Gift Set (0m+) Includes: 4 – 4oz/120mL bottles, 4 – Preemie Flow (Slowest Flow) nipples, 4– Level 1 (Slow Flow) nipples, 4 – Storage/travel caps, 1 – HappyPaci pacifier (0-6m)
body.description: Transitioning from breast to bottle and back again has never been smoother with Dr. Brown’s Natural Flow® Anti-Colic Options+™ Narrow Breast to Bottle Feeding Set. The anti-colic internal vent system is clinically proven to reduce colic. Dr. Brown’s bottles provide a more comfortable feeding experience for baby by decreasing spit-up, burping and gas. This vacuum-free feeding is closest to breastfeeding and Dr. Brown’s silicone nipples provide a consistent flow so baby can feed at their own pace. The breast-like nipple shape encourages a proper latch for a more natural bottle feeding experience and eases the transition from breast to bottle and back again. Dr. Brown’s vent system is proven to help preserve bottle milk nutrients and aids in digestion for a better night’s sleep. The silicone nipple, together with the internal vent system, offer a reliable and trusted bottle feeding experience that makes Dr. Brown’s the #1 Pediatrician Recommended Baby Bottle in the U.S.* Made to grow with baby, our bottle is designed to nourish through all of baby’s feeding stages and is recyclable. Safe for use in dishwasher (top rack only), electric and microwave sterilizers or boiling water. BPA Free.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must have for gassy babies !!
reviews.reviewText: These bottles work so well that all of them were stolen from us by several different family members!! They really work for babies with colic and gas . I’m a first time mom and at first we were using avent bottles and it was a nightmare. Baby was in so much pain from sucking in extra air during feedings. These bottles help baby pace feedings and filter out air. They do leak if your baby is trying to feed too fast because the extra air gets expelled through the top. They also will leak if you overfill the bottle. I always fill the water up first , leave a tiny bit of space under the line, and then put in the formula

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought this in order to feed baby. Baby loves it. However, I switch to Glass due to her loving it even better if your baby does not like Glass would definitely recommend the plastic ones. The only thing that I did do differently was to take out the centerpiece as my baby did not like it however, every baby is different so I would recommend trying it first with it before taking it out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My baby has really bad gerd . These bottles really helped her due to preventing all the air. She is spitting up less as well ! There is more parts to wash, however, there worth it !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Must Have for Premature Babies
reviews.reviewText: Our baby was born a month early. Feedings were so hard until we got these premie nipples. The best part of these bottles is that now we can use the size up. This is a great value, even if you don’t need the premie nipples. These are also our favorite bottles because of the vent. They also have little inserts for when you are traveling with a bottle prefilled.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best bottles and nipples
reviews.reviewText: My daughter, who was a micro preemie, used these bottles and nipples the entire time she was in the hospital. We have continued using them at home and have had no reason to try any other brand, as these are just perfect for her. We went from ultra preemie nipples to preemie and now to size 1. Every step was an easy transition.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classic baby gift!
reviews.reviewText: These went perfect for my sister in laws baby shower, she asked for the traditional colors and so I was so happy to bring in these beautiful pink ones for her little girl!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My little one only liked these Dr brown bottles. They are durable after many washes and sterilizations and I like that the numbers do not come off even after being so many uses. I don’t mind the many parts they come with. Cleaning them can become tedious. Only issue I have is these bottles will sometimes leak. Still haven’t figured out the trick to not get them to leak

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: When my daughter was first born, she was having trouble drinking from other bottles I got her these bottles to try them out and she started drinking out of them perfectly fine with no issues.

These are the only bottles my exclusives breastfed son will take . Too many parts to clean but they are best for colic . Bottles have lid too in case you wanna store your breastmilk and make them ready to feed .

reviews.reviewTitle: Los mejores biberones para el bebé

reviews.reviewText: Every time I warm the milk, I can see that the water in the warmer becomes milky and when in leave the bottle on the table I can see milk stains on the bottom. I’m not sure where the leak is from. Still trying to figure it out.Baby also has terrible stomachache after using the bottle.
Uso varias cosas de Dr Brown's para mi bebé, estos biberones son muy buenos, les da mucho uso

We solely used these bottles for the first month or so. We loved them until my son needed a shorter/wider nipple. I know a lot of people complain about all of the parts and small areas that need to be cleaned but I didn’t mind it at all. It was worth it to me and to our family.
